]] 'Capital Research Center' ('CRC') is an American conservative non-profit
organization located in Washington, DC. It was founded in 1984 by Willa Johnson
"to study non-profit organizations, with a special focus on reviving the
American traditions of charity, philanthropy, and voluntarism." The group
opposes the growth of government-welfare programs and promotes private sector
alternatives. [http://www.capitalresearch.org/about/ CRC's "About"
Page] It discourages donations by corporations to non-profits supporting
what it sees as anti-business or liberal policies. Often described as
"conservative", the Capital Research Center is sometimes described as "right
wing" or as being part of the "New Right". "conservative"
